definition: to plan a project/to stand on tiptoe/Taiwan pr. [qi4]/abbr. for 企業|企业[qi3 ye4]

sentences.english: No friends or relatives are allowance to your employer's house or let them stay overnight.
sentences.chinese: 雇主严禁你带朋友或亲属到雇主屋企或让她们过夜。

sentences.english: Go home and enjoy you life"?"
sentences.chinese: 你返屋企享受你既生活啦“？

sentences.english: The big bad wolf also got to the third little pig's door quicky.
sentences.chinese: 大灰狼好快就追到去猪三屋企。

sentences.english: In fact, I seldom go shopping. I prefer library and home to shopping mall.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，我平时中意某系图书馆同屋企多过去行街。

sentences.english: I went to aunt's house with the family the other day.
sentences.chinese: 前一拜，我同我屋企人一齐去了舅母的家。

sentences.english: There is a bald hill called Loaf Hill, which is very closed to the home of Small Boy.
sentences.chinese: 粗眉仔屋企附近，有个光秃秃的山，叫做面包山。

definition: so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
to be at, in or on (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 在[zai4]
Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
(literary) to wipe away (tears)/to press with one's fingers/to soak
what? (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
to know/to reprimand/to urge/to long for/to tell/to inform
to look down upon (classical)/to see/to look at (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 看[kan4]
